Name: La Rive
Review Text: We had the 4-course dinner served on the terrace at the Amstel. The menu consisted of a ceviche, followed by pulpo, bavette and a desert. The food was of very good quality though nothing out of the ordinary. Service was very good.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: I’ve had another absolutely amazing dinner experience at La Rive. I come here once or twice a year, visiting from the US, and the food, the service, the wines, the staff... they are all just unparalleled. …

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Amazing experience/dinner. A group of us were in a private room and every detail of this experience was perfect. This is food elevated to art. I wish i would have taken more pics of the food but i was too busy enjoying it.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Great fine dining experience. Very tasty and honest food and the presentation is superb as well. A lot of the fine dining places are now focused more on presentation and not so much about the original flavour of the ingredients. Also if you …

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Cozy, high quality experience with a great view of the river Amstel, especially the 4 tables next to the window. Small enough to feel quaint and intimate. Service is good and food quality is high. Fish is better than the meat.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Excellent food and wine, quiet and comfortable atmosphere, staff very welcoming and hospitable, really enjoyed my dining experience

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Perfect dinner with different types of wines, classic style, chill atmosphere by the river

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Great transformation from La Rive to Amstel restaurant!. We totally love the ambiance, the tasty modern food and the excellent highly professional, attentive service! The wine cellar at this place is remarkable - don't be satisfied with the …

Name: La Rive
Review Text: My wife and I went for dinner and we were seated facing the canal, which was beautiful. The service and wait staff were fantastic and made us feel great. My wife had vegetarian food and I had non vegetarian food. Both of us loved almost every single dish that we had. Wine pairing was excellent.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Had an absolutely delightful evening with impeccable service. The restaurant was above and beyond in two departments, food and service. The dishes were masterpieces in mixing fresh ingredients in season, alongside some excellent finesse. …

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Wow, this restaurant is top quality. From the maîtra d welcoming us outside door to the actual meal. Impressive.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: We had dinner here, it was very quiet but the food took a very long time, wasn't really warm and the chef had forgotten the vegetables. Really expensive for what you get. Service was friendly but not very professional. I expected a lot more from this place.

Name: La Rive
Review Text: It'd had been 3 years since I last dined here and at that time I thought it was the best vegetarian pre fixe meal I'd ever had, I I dine all over the world. Upon return to Amsterdam, my first move was to book a reservation here. I find its …

Name: La Rive
Review Text: A Big "Thanks" is gone to Floris, for his kindness .  A very beautiful place. The quality of meal it was wonderful. Our menu had 7 courses, that was a  trip into the gourmet. We had there the best Oyster ever. Super experience to be repeated !

Name: La Rive
Review Text: A good experience overall. One minus worth mentioning - things moved very very slow. Basically, the starters came in about 10 minutes and the main course came 1 hour and 45 minutes in. To be fair, the waiters were all very very nice, …

Name: La Rive

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Wow what a place! Amazing food with stunning views. Definitely book in advance by email. Is tough to get there but so so worth it. We recommend the lamb dish.!The complimentary drinks and cheesecake were lovely touches also.

Review Text: Fantastic experience! Regular menu and vegetarian menu fantastically prepared, together with wine pairing with every dish and the very well experienced colleagues that are able to give a full night experience!

Name: La Rive
Review Text: Gorgeous interior and canal side view, but mediocre food, grossly overpriced. Service was attentive, but male waiters seemed gruff.  Head waiter was excellent, as was demure female server. Food is more appealing to a meat and seafood crowd. Patrons were mostly older, very overweight.
